content: Is your Grasstop Grotto still serving you well? If you'd like to improve your living space, the <style=Highlight>Housing Services</style> in Loomi Mart may be just what you need. Why not take a look at this promo?
info: 络米商联-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, have you been to the beach? There are all kinds of shore-dwellers there. Perhaps <style=NpcName>Esassani</style> could show you around.
info: 络米商联-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: But if you're not in a rush to head to the seaside, hoho... I'd love to show you what Loomi Co. just sent over—
info: 络米商联-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Through <style=SizeBig>Loomi Mart</style>, Loomi Co. provides an expanding range of high-quality services to support your planet's growth and daily life.
info: 络米商联-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II
络米商联-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, if you have a moment and would like to learn about building houses, I'd love to show you what Loomi Co. just sent over—
info: 络米商联-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Ahem, building a house means making your life a little cozier and a bit more fun while you're nurturing your planet.
info: 络米商联-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Feeling ready to build a new place of your own?
info: 络米商联-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: A bigger and better house could be yours... for just <style=SizeBig><style=Highlight>1,200 Dough</style>!</style>
info: 络米商联-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Oh, pardon me! If you're wondering how to <style=Highlight>earn 1,200 Dough,</style> you might want to ask <style=Highlight>Glenn</style> about <style=Highlight>selling</style> items. And of course, I'm always here if you need anything else.
info: 络米商联-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II
